## Class Readings

Required text, available online via Baruch Newman Library.

- Newcomer, Kathryn E., Harry P. Hatry, and Joseph S. Wholey. 2015. [Handbook of Practical Program Evaluation](https://cuny-bb.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/permalink/01CUNY_BB/1r6p7jg/alma9994414097806122). Fourth ed. San Francisco, CA: Jossey-Bass. [Hereafter, “Handbook”].

## Grading

Final grades will be calculated as follows:

<div style="width:550px">
Item                           | Weight | Notes
-------------------------------|--------|-------------------------------------
Weekly case study              | 40 %   | 5 cases
Project: Proposal              | 10 %   | 
Project: Presentation          | 20 %   |
Project: Final report          | 30 %   |

</div>
